search.title: Chercher
searchTips.composite.1: The search banana ice cream prioritizes results that contain all three terms: banana, ice, and cream. Results with one or more of the given terms will follow
searchTips.composite.2: +banane crème glacée requiert que seuls les résultats avec le terme banane soit renvoyés, alors que crème et glacée sont optionnels
searchTips.composite.3: -banane crème glacéegarantit qu'aucun résultat avec le terme banane ne sera renvoyé
searchTips.composite.4: banane AND "crème glacée"requiert que seuls les résultats avec à la fois banane et crème glacée soient renvoyés
searchTips.composite.5: banane OR "crème glacée"garantit que seuls les résultats avec soit banane soit crème glacée soient renvoyés
searchTips.composite.6: These operations can be combined as you like. For example banana AND (“ice cream” OR “gelato”) -chocolate will return results where banana appears with ice cream or gelato in the document but where chocolate is not present
searchTips.composite.title: Requêtes composées
searchTips.exact.1: Use "" to return only exact matches. For example, the search "barack obama" will return only results containing the exact phrase "barack obama"
searchTips.exact.title: Correspondances exactes
searchTips.proximity.1: To search for two terms within a certain distance of each other, use double quotes "" around the two words and the tilde ~ symbol at the end of the phrase. For example “Bank America”~2 will find relevant matches with the terms "Bank" and "America" occurring within two words from each other, such as "Bank of America", "Bank in America", even "America has a Bank".
searchTips.proximity.title: Recherches par proximité
searchTips.spelling.1: Use ~ to increase the fuzziness of a search. For example, Wladimir~2 will return not just the term “Wladimir” but also similar spellings such as "Wladimyr" or "Vladimyr". A spelling variant is defined by the number of spelling mistakes that must be made to get from the original word to the variant.
searchTips.spelling.title: Spelling variants
